mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIL_MT_ANALYSIS ( ID, DATE_, EXPOSURE_NUM, VISIT_NUM, ORDER_NUM, SHOP_NAME) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{exposureNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO BIL_MT_SALES ( ID, DATE_, NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, SELL_NUM, PERCENTAGE_NUM, PERCENTAGE_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{percentageNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{percentagePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO BIL_MT_COMMENT ( ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, COMMENT_, FOODS, SCORE_MEANING, NAME, SHIP_TIME, TASTE_SCORE, SHIP_SCORE, PACKAGING_SCORE, ORDER_COMMENT_SCORE, E_COMMENT ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tasteScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shipScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packagingScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCommentScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO BIL_MT_BILL( ID, NAME, TRADE_TYPE, DESC_, PAY_TYPE, APP_NO, ORDER_CREATE_TIME, DONE_TIME, REDUND_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, SHIP_TYPE, SHIP_STATUS, PAY_DAY, VESTING_DAY, SHOP_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, PROMATION_PRICE, MT_TUAN_SUBSIDY, SERVICE_CHARGE, SHIP_PRICE, ONLINE_PIRCE, OFFLINE_PRICE, RATE, GUARANTEES, DISCOUNT, APP_SEQ, SETTLE_STATUS) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{doneTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{refundTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDay,jdbcType=DATE}, #{vestingDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotionPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meiTuanSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlinePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offlnePirce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guarantees,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO BIL_MT_ACT ( ID, SHOP_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, TYPE, ACT_NAME, IS_END, CONTEXT) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
